SELECT A.*, NVL(B.IS_BRAND, 0) AS IS_BRAND, NVL(C.SALES, 0) AS SALES FROM PRODUCT A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT BRAND, COUNT(BRAND) AS IS_BRAND FROM TBL_SELLER WHERE BRAND = '메종키츠네' GROUP BY BRAND) B ON A.BRAND = B.BRAND LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PNO, SALES FROM TBL_SALES_VOLUME) C ON A.PNO = C.PNO
WHERE A.BRAND LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%' OR A.PNAME LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%'
WHERE A.PRICE >= #{min} AND A.BRAND LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%' OR A.PNAME LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%'
WHERE A.PRICE <= #{max} AND A.BRAND LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%' OR A.PNAME LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%'
WHERE A.PRICE BETWEEN #{min} AND #{max} AND A.BRAND LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%' OR A.PNAME LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%'
WHERE A.SHIPPING_FEE = 0 AND A.BRAND LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%' OR A.PNAME LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%'
WHERE A.SHIPPING_FEE = 0 AND A.PRICE >= #{min} AND A.BRAND LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%' OR A.PNAME LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%'
WHERE A.SHIPPING_FEE = 0 AND A.PRICE <= #{max} AND A.BRAND LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%' OR A.PNAME LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%'
WHERE A.SHIPPING_FEE = 0 AND A.PRICE BETWEEN #{min} AND #{max} AND A.BRAND LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%' OR A.PNAME LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%'
ORDER BY A.PNO DESC
ORDER BY C.SALES DESC
ORDER BY A.PRICE ASC
ORDER BY A.PRICE DESC
